Package videopoker.helpers

Class Stats

java.lang.Object
videopoker.helpers.Stats
All Implemented Interfaces:
IStats
public class Stats extends Object implements IStats
This class is used to store the statistics of the game.

It is composed of a list of StatCombination objects, keeping as well a counter for the total value of gains and bets.

It also keeps track of the number of hands delt.

      public int counter

  • Constructor Details

    • Stats

      public Stats(int credit)
      Creates an instance of Stats with a given initial player credits. The table of stats is then built with StatCombination objects of the default hand types.
      Parameters:
      credit - The initial player credits.

  • Method Details

    • addStat

      public void addStat(String k, int cashback, int bet)
      This method is used to increment a specified hand stat.

      The String k is used to identify the hand to be incremented, the cashback is the amount of credits won and the bet is the amount of credits betted.

      This method increases the stats, the gains, and updates the player balance.

      Specified by:
      addStat in interface IStats
      Parameters:
      k - Short name of the type of hand
      cashback - Amount won by player
      bet - Amount betted

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Prints the statistics table, iterating over every entry on the Stats Table, showing the occurence of each type of hand and the total dealt hands.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
